Question
========

If, for the pmcc between X and Y, r = 1, then it means

Answerlist
----------

* All points (X, Y) lie on one line.
* X causes Y.
* X and Y are independent.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* All the points (X, Y) are on one line...: Correct
* X causes Y.: Incorrect
* X and Y are independent: Incorrect
